sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../css/pure-css-progress-bars-master/assets/css/cssprogress.css' export default class ChampionStatBars extends React.Component { render() { attack = this.props.info.attack defense = this.props.info.defense magic = this.props.info.magic const difficulty = this.props.info.difficulty return(

ATTACK: {attack}

DEFENSE: {defense}

MAGIC: {magic}

DIFFICULTY: {difficulty}

{attack}
) } }
